column4: I recently removed XFCE from my xubuntu installation and installed (successfully) Netbook Remix.  It worked for a week, and now boots without loading gnome-panel, and all applications open with no title bar and cannot be maximised, resized, or moved.  Maximus seems to still be operational.  What do I need to do to resture Netbook Remix to regular operation?
I don't believe compiz is running by default when Netbook Remix loads, however I can fire it up from a terminal and it restores the missing titlebars until it is terminated.
